verses.verse: For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> I <WG1473> Paul <WG3972>, the prisoner <WG1198> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> for <WG5228> you <WG5216> Gentiles <WG1484>,
If <WG1489> ye have heard <WG191> of the dispensation <WG3622> of the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> me <WG3427> to <WG1519> you-ward <WG5209>:

How that <WG3754> by <WG2596> revelation <WG602> he made known <WG1107> unto me <WG3427> the mystery <WG3466>; (as <WG2531> I wrote afore <WG4270> in <WG1722> few words <WG3641>, afore: or, a little before
Whereby <WG4314> <WG3739>, when ye read <WG314>, ye may <WG1410> understand <WG3539> my <WG3450> knowledge <WG4907> in <WG1722> the mystery <WG3466> of Christ <WG5547>)

Which <WG3739> in <WG1722> other <WG2087> ages <WG1074> was <WG1107> not <WG3756> made known <WG1107> unto the sons <WG5207> of men <WG444>, as <WG5613> it is <WG601> now <WG3568> revealed <WG601> unto his <WG846> holy <WG40> apostles <WG652> and <WG2532> prophets <WG4396> by <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>;

That the Gentiles <WG1484> should be <WG1511> fellowheirs <WG4789>, and <WG2532> of the same body <WG4954>, and <WG2532> partakers <WG4830> of his <WG846> promise <WG1860> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> by <WG1223> the gospel <WG2098>:

Whereof <WG3739> I was made <WG1096> a minister <WG1249>, according <WG2596> to the gift <WG1431> of the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> given <WG1325> unto me <WG3427> by <WG2596> the effectual working <WG1753> of his <WG846> power <WG1411>.

Unto me <WG1698>, who am less than the least <WG1647> of all <WG3956> saints <WG40>, is <WG1325> this <WG3778> grace <WG5485> given <WG1325>, that I should preach <WG2097> among <WG1722> the Gentiles <WG1484> the unsearchable <WG421> riches <WG4149> of Christ <WG5547>;

And <WG2532> to make <WG5461> all <WG3956> men see <WG5461> what <WG5101> is the fellowship <WG2842> of the mystery <WG3466>, which <WG3588> from <WG575> the beginning of the world <WG165> hath been hid <WG613> in <WG1722> God <WG2316>, who <WG3588> created <WG2936> all things <WG3956> by <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>:

To the intent that <WG2443> now <WG3568> unto the principalities <WG746> and <WG2532> powers <WG1849> in <WG1722> heavenly <WG2032> places might be known <WG1107> by <WG1223> the church <WG1577> the manifold <WG4182> wisdom <WG4678> of God <WG2316>,
According to <WG2596> the eternal <WG165> purpose <WG4286> which <WG3739> he purposed <WG4160> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>:
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2192> boldness <WG3954> and <WG2532> access <WG4318> with <WG1722> confidence <WG4006> by <WG1223> the faith <WG4102> of him <WG846>.

Wherefore <WG1352> I desire <WG154> that ye faint <WG1573> not <WG3361> at <WG1722> my <WG3450> tribulations <WG2347> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, which <WG3748> is <WG2076> your <WG5216> glory <WG1391>.
For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> I bow <WG2578> my <WG3450> knees <WG1119> unto <WG4314> the Father <WG3962> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>,
Of <WG1537> whom <WG3739> the whole <WG3956> family <WG3965> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1909> <WG1093> is named <WG3687>,

That <WG2443> he would grant <WG1325> you <WG5213>, according to <WG2596> the riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> glory <WG1391>, to be strengthened <WG2901> with might <WG1411> by <WG1223> his <WG846> Spirit <WG4151> in <WG1519> the inner <WG2080> man <WG444>;

That Christ <WG5547> may dwell <WG2730> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> by <WG1223> faith <WG4102>; that <WG2443> ye, being rooted <WG4492> and <WG2532> grounded <WG2311> in <WG1722> love <WG26>,

May be able <WG1840> to comprehend <WG2638> with <WG4862> all <WG3956> saints <WG40> what <WG5101> is the breadth <WG4114>, and <WG2532> length <WG3372>, and <WG2532> depth <WG899>, and <WG2532> height <WG5311>;

And <WG5037> to know <WG1097> the love <WG26> of Christ <WG5547>, which passeth <WG5235> knowledge <WG1108>, that <WG2443> ye might be filled <WG4137> with <WG1519> all <WG3956> the fulness <WG4138> of God <WG2316>.

Now <WG1161> unto him that is able <WG1410> to do <WG4160> exceeding <WG5228> abundantly <WG1537> <WG4053> above <WG5228> all <WG3956> that <WG3739> we ask <WG154> or <WG2228> think <WG3539>, according to <WG2596> the power <WG1411> that worketh <WG1754> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>,

Unto him <WG846> be glory <WG1391> in <WG1722> the church <WG1577> by <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> throughout <WG1519> all <WG3956> ages <WG1074>, world <WG165> without end <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.
